SEARCH
Package uk.msci.project.rsa

Class BenchmarkingContext

java.lang.Object
uk.msci.project.rsa.BenchmarkingContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
KeyGenerationContext, SignatureBaseContext
public abstract class BenchmarkingContext extends Object
This abstract class that provides a framework for specialised functionality within the results module related to signature operations that have been benchmarked. It offers methods for exporting results and other relevant data, as well as for controlling the display of UI elements in a generalised results view, tailored to the specific signature operation that was benchmarked.

  • Method Details

    • exportPublicKeyBatch

      public void exportPublicKeyBatch() throws IOException
      Exports the batch of public keys generated during the benchmarking process. The method is to be overridden in subclasses to handle operation-specific export logic.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the export.

    • exportPrivateKeyBatch

      public void exportPrivateKeyBatch() throws IOException
      Exports the batch of private keys generated during the benchmarking process. The method is to be overridden in subclasses to handle operation-specific export logic.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the export.

    • exportSignatureBatch

      public void exportSignatureBatch() throws IOException
      Exports the batch of signatures generated during the benchmarking process. The method is to be overridden in subclasses to handle operation-specific export logic.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during file writing.

    • exportNonRecoverableMessages

      public void exportNonRecoverableMessages() throws IOException
      Exports the batch of non-recoverable messages generated during the benchmarking process. The method is to be overridden in subclasses to handle operation-specific export logic.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • exportVerificationResults

      public void exportVerificationResults(int keyIndex, int keySize, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage) throws IOException
      Exports the results of the signature verification process conducted during benchmarking. The method is intended to be overridden in subclasses to handle operation-specific export logic.
      Parameters:
      keyIndex - The index of the verification key.
      keySize - The length of the key/key size for which verification results are exported.
      primaryStage - The primary stage for the UI (JavaFX Stage).
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during file writing.

    • showExportPublicKeyBatchButton

      public boolean showExportPublicKeyBatchButton()
      Determines if the UI button for exporting the public key batch should be shown. Subclasses can override this method to provide operation-specific display logic.
      Returns:
      false by default

    • showExportPrivateKeyBatchButton

      public boolean showExportPrivateKeyBatchButton()
      Determines if the UI button for exporting the private key batch should be shown. Subclasses can override this method to provide operation-specific display logic.
      Returns:
      false by default

    • showExportSignatureBatchButton

      public boolean showExportSignatureBatchButton()
      Determines if the UI button for exporting the signature batch should be shown. Subclasses can override this method to provide operation-specific display logic.
      Returns:
      false by default

    • showExportVerificationResultsButton

      public boolean showExportVerificationResultsButton()
      Determines if the UI button for exporting verification results should be shown. Subclasses can override this method to provide operation-specific display logic.
      Returns:
      false by default

    • getResultsLabel

      public abstract String getResultsLabel(boolean isComparisonMode)
      Provides a context-specific label for the results view based on the specific operation that was benchmarked. This label is used to display relevant information about the benchmarking context in the UI, offering users a clear understanding of the results being presented. The label can vary depending on whether the benchmarking is conducted in normal benchmarking mode displaying the single hash function used, differing from comparison mode where multiple hash functions can potentially be used so the hash function name is omitted from label.
      Parameters:
      isComparisonMode - A boolean flag indicating whether the benchmarking is done in comparison mode, which may affect the label content.
      Returns:
      A string representing the specific label for the benchmarking context.

    • showNonRecoverableBatchButton

      public boolean showNonRecoverableBatchButton()
      Determines if the UI button for exporting the non-recoverable portions of messages generated from signature creation should be shown. Subclasses can override this method to provide operation-specific display logic.
      Returns:
      false by default

    • getKeyConfigToHashFunctionsMap

      public Map<Integer,List<HashFunctionSelection>> getKeyConfigToHashFunctionsMap()
      Retrieves a map linking each group index to its corresponding list of hash functions and their provable security status. This abstract method provides a framework for subclasses to implement specific logic related to hash function configurations in different benchmarking contexts.
      Returns:
      A map where each key is a group index and each value is a list of pairs of DigestType and a boolean indicating if it's provably secure. Returns null in the default implementation.

    • getKeysPerGroup

      public int getKeysPerGroup()
      Retrieves the number of keys considered as a group in the benchmarking context.
      Returns:
      The number of keys per group used in the benchmarking. Returns 0 in the default implementation.

    • getTrialsPerKeyByGroup

      public int[] getTrialsPerKeyByGroup()
      Provides an array representing the number of trials performed for each key within a group in a benchmarking context.
      Returns:
      An array where each element corresponds to the number of trials for a key in a specific group. Returns null in the default implementation.

    • getTotalHashFunctions

      public int getTotalHashFunctions()
      Retrieves the total number of hash functions used across all groups in the benchmarking context.
      Returns:
      The total number of hash functions used in the benchmarking process. Returns 0 in the default implementation.

    • getTotalGroups

      public int getTotalGroups()
      Retrieves the total number of distinct groups formed in a benchmarking context.
      Returns:
      The total number of groups in the benchmarking process. Returns 0 in the default implementation.

    • getCustomHashSizeFraction

      public int[] getCustomHashSizeFraction()
      Retrieves the fraction used to calculate the custom hash size based on provided key lengths in normal benchmarking mode.
      Returns:
      corresponding fraction represented as an int list

    • getHashType

      public DigestType getHashType()
      Retrieves the type of hash function currently set in the model.
      Returns:
      The current hash function type.

    • getProvablySecure

      public boolean getProvablySecure()
      Indicates whether the signature scheme operates in provably secure mode.
      Returns:
      true if the signature scheme is operating in provably secure mode, false otherwise.
